<h3 id="X18180">X(18180) = (A',B',C',X(2); A,B,C,X(1)) COLLINEATION IMAGE OF X(63), WHERE  A'B'C' = ANTICEVIAN TRIANGLE OF X(75)</h3>
Barycentrics &nbsp;&nbsp; a (a + b) (a + c) (a^2 b^2 - b^4 + a^2 c^2 + 2 b^2 c^2 - c^4) : :

<p>
